channel.title: quantitative-ethnoecology on Cory Whitney
channel.description: Recent content in quantitative-ethnoecology on Cory Whitney

item.title: Quantitative Ethnobotany
item.description: Quantitative ethnobotany has been used to describe the importance of plants and plant types for human communities. Assessments throughout the tropics highlight the importance of botanical diversity in rich but rapidly deteriorating regional socio-cultural and ecological systems. The tools help to illustrate the interconnectedness of conservation of plants and preservation of traditional knowledge. We seek to expand their application to other species assessments.
